full_text: Screened by NARA. 9/22/2023 Information Furnished On This Form Is Confidential FOR FOREIGN SERVICE SEAL INSTRUCTIONS One number is all you ever need for Social Security and Tax Purposes in the United States. Special attention should be given to items listed below. Fill in this form completely and correctly. If any information is not known and is unavailable write "Unknown." Use typewriter or print legibly in dark ink. 1 Your social security card will be typed with the name you show in Item 1. You should there- fore, be certain to show it exactly as you will use it for work or business 3 Enter the name of the city or locality of birth. Also, enter the province, county, State, or re- gion of birth, and the country in which you were born. 5 If a stepfather, adopting father, or foster father is shown, indicate the relationship after name: for example, "John H. Jones, stepfather." If you have ever before filled out an application like this for an American social security, railroad, or tax number, check "yes", even if you never received your card. If you check 10 "yes", give the name of the American State where you made application and the approximate date on which you applied. Also enter your American social security number, if you did receive the card and remember the number. You may find your number on an old tax return, payroll slip, wage statement, or bank record FOR BUREAU OF DATA PROCESSING USE If you will get your mail in a rural area of the United States, without a street address, show 11 your Rural Delivery Route and box number: if you will get the mail at a U.S. post office, show the P.O. Box number: if there is no such way of showing your mail address, enter the U.S. town or post office name. If mail under your name is not normally received at the address which you show, use an "in-care-of" address. It is extremely important for you to show the zip code if you know it. Sign your name as usually written. Do Not print unless this is your usual signature (If you are unable to write, make a mark witnessed two persons who can write Both witnesses 14 must sign this application. A parent, guardia custodian who completes this form on be- half of another person should sign his own e followed by his title or relationship to the applicant. for example, John Smith, father")
